meta.title: Madizi – Online obituaries & death notices
meta.description: Publish an obituary in minutes, and share vigils and funeral schedules with family, loved ones, and the diaspora.

hero.title: Announce a death and inform everyone—without leaving anyone out.
hero.subtitle: Madizi helps families and the diaspora share clear, reliable information.
hero.body: Create a structured obituary, add vigils, a service, burial details, and easily share the link via WhatsApp, SMS, or social networks.
hero.helperText: A service designed for Africa and its diaspora, with time zones and online events in mind.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: 3 simple steps to inform everyone.
howItWorks.step1: Fill in the deceased person’s details (name, dates, city, country…).
howItWorks.step2: Add events: vigils, services, burial, including online options (Zoom, Facebook Live…).
howItWorks.step3: Share the unique obituary link with family, friends, and the community.
